1→/**
     2→ * API Route: Reset User Password
     3→ * POST /api/auth/users/[userId]/reset-password - Send password reset email to user
     4→ */
     5→
     6→import { NextRequest, NextResponse } from 'next/server'
     7→import { authenticateRequest } from '@/lib/auth'
     8→import { authServiceClient } from '@/lib/api/auth-service-client'
     9→
    10→export async function POST(
    11→  req: NextRequest,
    12→  { params }: { params: { userId: string } }
    13→) {
    14→  try {
    15→    // Authenticate the request
    16→    await authenticateRequest(req)
    17→
    18→    const { userId } = params
    19→
    20→    // Parse request body
    21→    const body = await req.json().catch(() => ({}))
    22→    const email = body.email as string | undefined
    23→
    24→    // Call auth service to send password reset email
    25→    const response = await authServiceClient.resetEndUserPassword({
    26→      userId,
    27→      email,
    28→    })
    29→
    30→    return NextResponse.json(response)
    31→  } catch (error) {
    32→    console.error('Error resetting password:', error)
    33→
    34→    if (error instanceof Error && error.message === 'No token provided') {
    35→      return NextResponse.json(
    36→        { error: 'Unauthorized', message: 'Authentication required' },
    37→        { status: 401 }
    38→      )
    39→    }
    40→
    41→    if (error instanceof Error && error.message === 'Invalid token') {
    42→      return NextResponse.json(
    43→        { error: 'Unauthorized', message: 'Invalid authentication token' },
    44→        { status: 401 }
    45→      )
    46→    }
    47→
    48→    return NextResponse.json(
    49→      { error: 'Internal Server Error', message: 'Failed to send password reset email' },
    50→      { status: 500 }
    51→    )
    52→  }
    53→}
    54→

1→/**
     2→ * Auth Service API Client
     3→ * Client for interacting with the auth service for user management
     4→ */
     5→
     6→import type {
     7→  EndUser,
     8→  EndUserListQuery,
     9→  EndUserListResponse,
    10→  EndUserDetailResponse,
    11→  DisableEndUserRequest,
    12→  EnableEndUserRequest,
    13→  EndUserStatusResponse,
    14→  UpdateEndUserMetadataRequest,
    15→  DeleteEndUserRequest,
    16→  DeleteEndUserResponse,
    17→  ResetEndUserPasswordRequest,
    18→  ResetEndUserPasswordResponse,
    19→  EndUserSession,
    20→  EndUserSessionsResponse,
    21→  RevokeEndUserSessionRequest,
    22→  RevokeEndUserSessionResponse,
    23→  AuthServiceError,
    24→} from '@/lib/types/auth-user.types'
    25→
    26→/**
    27→ * Auth service configuration
    28→ */
    29→interface AuthServiceConfig {
    30→  baseUrl: string
    31→  apiKey: string
    32→}
    33→
    34→/**
    35→ * Auth service API client
    36→ */
    37→export class AuthServiceClient {
    38→  private config: AuthServiceConfig
    39→
    40→  constructor(config: AuthServiceConfig) {
    41→    this.config = config
    42→  }
    43→
    44→  /**
    45→   * Make an authenticated request to the auth service
    46→   */
    47→  private async request<T>(
    48→    endpoint: string,
    49→    options: RequestInit = {}
    50→  ): Promise<T> {
    51→    const url = `${this.config.baseUrl}${endpoint}`
    52→
    53→    const headers: HeadersInit = {
    54→      'Content-Type': 'application/json',
    55→      'Authorization': `Bearer ${this.config.apiKey}`,
    56→      ...options.headers,
    57→    }
    58→
    59→    try {
    60→      const response = await fetch(url, {
    61→        ...options,
    62→        headers,
    63→      })
    64→
    65→      if (!response.ok) {
    66→        const error: AuthServiceError = await response.json().catch(() => ({
    67→          error: 'Unknown error',
    68→          message: `HTTP ${response.status}: ${response.statusText}`,
    69→        }))
    70→        throw new AuthServiceApiClientError(error.message, error)
    71→      }
    72→
    73→      return await response.json()
    74→    } catch (error) {
    75→      if (error instanceof AuthServiceApiClientError) {
    76→        throw error
    77→      }
    78→      throw new AuthServiceApiClientError(
    79→        'Failed to connect to auth service',
    80→        {
    81→          error: 'NetworkError',
    82→          message: error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'Unknown error',
    83→        }
    84→      )
    85→    }
    86→  }
    87→
    88→  /**
    89→   * List all end-users with optional filtering
    90→   */
    91→  async listEndUsers(query: EndUserListQuery = {}): Promise<EndUserListResponse> {
    92→    const params = new URLSearchParams()
    93→
    94→    if (query.limit) params.append('limit', String(query.limit))
    95→    if (query.offset) params.append('offset', String(query.offset))
    96→    if (query.search) params.append('search', query.search)
    97→    if (query.status) params.append('status', query.status)
    98→    if (query.auth_provider) params.append('auth_provider', query.auth_provider)
    99→    if (query.created_after) params.append('created_after', query.created_after)
   100→    if (query.created_before) params.append('created_before', query.created_before)
   101→    if (query.last_sign_in_after) params.append('last_sign_in_after', query.last_sign_in_after)
   102→    if (query.last_sign_in_before) params.append('last_sign_in_before', query.last_sign_in_before)
   103→    if (query.sort_by) params.append('sort_by', query.sort_by)
   104→    if (query.sort_order) params.append('sort_order', query.sort_order)
   105→
   106→    const queryString = params.toString()
   107→    return this.request<EndUserListResponse>(`/users${queryString ? `?${queryString}` : ''}`)
   108→  }
   109→
   110→  /**
   111→   * Get a single end-user by ID
   112→   */
   113→  async getEndUser(userId: string): Promise<EndUserDetailResponse> {
   114→    return this.request<EndUserDetailResponse>(`/users/${userId}`)
   115→  }
   116→
   117→  /**
   118→   * Disable an end-user account
   119→   */
   120→  async disableEndUser(request: DisableEndUserRequest): Promise<EndUserStatusResponse> {
   121→    return this.request<EndUserStatusResponse>(`/users/${request.userId}/disable`, {
   122→      method: 'POST',
   123→      body: JSON.stringify({ reason: request.reason }),
   124→    })
   125→  }
   126→
   127→  /**
   128→   * Enable (re-enable) an end-user account
   129→   */
   130→  async enableEndUser(request: EnableEndUserRequest): Promise<EndUserStatusResponse> {
   131→    return this.request<EndUserStatusResponse>(`/users/${request.userId}/enable`, {
   132→      method: 'POST',
   133→    })
   134→  }
   135→
   136→  /**
   137→   * Update end-user metadata
   138→   */
   139→  async updateEndUserMetadata(request: UpdateEndUserMetadataRequest): Promise<EndUserDetailResponse> {
   140→    return this.request<EndUserDetailResponse>(`/users/${request.userId}/metadata`, {
   141→      method: 'PATCH',
   142→      body: JSON.stringify({ metadata: request.metadata }),
   143→    })
   144→  }
   145→
   146→  /**
   147→   * Delete an end-user account
   148→   */
   149→  async deleteEndUser(request: DeleteEndUserRequest): Promise<DeleteEndUserResponse> {
   150→    return this.request<DeleteEndUserResponse>(`/users/${request.userId}`, {
   151→      method: 'DELETE',
   152→      body: JSON.stringify({ reason: request.reason }),
   153→    })
   154→  }
   155→
   156→  /**
   157→   * Reset end-user password (sends reset email)
   158→   */
   159→  async resetEndUserPassword(request: ResetEndUserPasswordRequest): Promise<ResetEndUserPasswordResponse> {
   160→    return this.request<ResetEndUserPasswordResponse>(`/users/${request.userId}/reset-password`, {
   161→      method: 'POST',
   162→      body: JSON.stringify({ email: request.email }),
   163→    })
   164→  }
   165→
   166→  /**
   167→   * Get all sessions for an end-user
   168→   */
